merrilldave wrote:
> 
> 
> Hi, J-newb here, long-time programmer in other languages, just
> spinning up on junit.
> 
> I've installed and tested junit as spec'd in its readme, like this:
> 
> ----------------------
> Unzipped junit to:
> C:\Program Files\JavaPackages\junit3.8.1\
> 
> Added the following to the system classpath:
> C:\Program Files\JavaPackages\junit3.8.1\junit.jar;
> 
> Started a cmd prompt in the junit3.8.1 directory, and typed:
> java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests

This seems to be related to a CLASSPATH with a space in it, although I 
haven't tested that myself. Try removing the space -- move JUnit out of 
"Program Files".
--
